bio: She is a 4 year old calico cat that was rescued from the streets by a vet. She is an extremely vocal cat who isn't afraid to talk sass. She enjoys sniffing any food that you have, but for some reason has no interest in eating human food.
His name is Toast and he's the woastiest Toast to roast and post on the coast to boast the most!
Potato is a pug-dachshund mix. When she was rescued, she was found in a dumpster, so she is often refered to as dumpster baby. She is very long and stout, built like a tank.
He's a Norwegian hunter type of dog puppy. He loves to play fetch and hunting for treats in hard to reach spots. He's very friendly with people and his favorite hobby is napping.
